Changelog
=========


1.2.0 (2020-09-08)
------------------

- Add script to dump perf_metrics for all instances in InfluxDB format.
  [lgraf]


1.1.0 (2020-04-30)
------------------

- Add `perf_metrics` command to get various performance related metrics.
  [lgraf]


1.0.0 (2019-11-18)
------------------

- Initial implementation.
  [lgraf]
